solution_line_template: The amount paid to the teacher per day is {periods_per_day} periods * ${pay_per_period} / period = $<<{periods_per_day}*{pay_per_period}={pay_per_day}>>{pay_per_day} per day.
The amount paid for {work_days_per_month} days is ${pay_per_day} / day * {work_days_per_month} days = $<<{pay_per_day}*{work_days_per_month}={pay_per_month}>>{pay_per_month}.
The total amount for {months_worked} months is ${pay_per_month} * {months_worked} = $<<{pay_per_month}*{months_worked}={total_earned}>>{total_earned}.
